exit_steps.title: AIRE Registration (Anagrafe degli Italiani Residenti all'Estero)
requirements: Proof of residence in destination country (e.g., Meldunek certificate)
exit_steps.outcome: Registration in AIRE database and transfer of residency from Italy
exit_steps.notes: Ensures access to consular services and avoids double taxation. Processing time is usually long but registration is effective from the date of application.
